events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision on the highway involving another car. Initial details were provided by the claimant.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords including vehicle and collision mentioned in the initial report.
An experienced agent specializing in auto accidents was assigned to the claim to ensure appropriate handling and customer support.
Acknowledgement sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and informing them about the next steps.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and medical bills for injuries sustained during the accident.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including pictures, police report, and hospital bills for review.
Investigation began focusing on verifying accident details, evaluating damage extent, and assessing liability.
Investigation concluded confirming claimant's version of the accident and corroborating damage and injury claims.
A fair settlement amount was proposed covering vehicle repair costs and medical expenses related to the accident.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and clear communication during the claims process.
Claim was officially approved after claimant agreed to the proposed settlement amount and terms.
Settlement payment was processed and disbursed to the claimantâ€™s account as per agreed terms following approval.
The claim was officially closed with all parties satisfied and the necessary compensation awarded.
